GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Fix races among concurrent hw_params and hw_free calls

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.109 by commit 0f6947f5f5208f6ebd4d76a82a4757e2839a23f8. For more details please see the references link.
